identification.title: Fast identification
identification.desc: Biometric matching from a single neonatal plantar print.

ai.title: Embedded AI
ai.desc: Smart processing on the device, with AI algorithms executed in real time.

impact.desc: Prevents identification errors and facilitates pediatric follow-up.

validation.title: Clinical validation
validation.desc: Trials in collaboration with leading hospitals.
